mapper.select: select * from districts where districtname=#{provinceName} or shortname=#{provinceName}
select * from districts where districtname=#{cityName} or shortname=#{cityName} and districtcode like concat(#{provinceCode0to2},'%')
select * from districts where districtname=#{countyName} or shortname=#{countyName} and districtcode like concat(#{cityCode0to4},'%')
select * from districts where districtname=#{villageName} or shortname=#{villageName} and districtcode like concat(#{countyCode0to6},'%')
select * from sheepdogs where districtcode like concat(#{villageCode0to9},'%') and ((neckletid ='-1' and apparatusid !='-1') or (apparatusid ='-1' and neckletid !='-1'))
select count(*) from exhibitrealtime where districtcode like concat(#{villageCode0to9},'%')
select count(*) from appexhibitrealtime where districtcode like concat(#{villageCode0to9},'%')
select districtcode,epidemic from districts where districtcode like concat(#{villageCode0to9},'%')
select privilegelevel from managers where province=#{provinceName} and city=#{cityName} and county=#{countyName} and village=#{villageName}
select count(*) from sheepdogs where districtcode like concat(#{villageCode0to9} , '%');
select districtcode from districts where districtname=#{provinceName} or shortname=#{provinceName}
select districtcode from districts where districtname=#{cityName} or shortname=#{cityName} and districtcode like concat(#{thisProvince0to2},'%')
select districtcode from districts where districtname=#{countyName} or shortname=#{countyName} and districtcode like concat(#{thisCity0to4},'%')
select districtcode from districts where districtname=#{villageName} or shortname=#{villageName} and districtcode like concat(#{thisCounty0to6},'%')

select districtcode, districtname,shortname,epidemic,lng,lat from districts where districtcode REGEXP concat(#{thisVillage0to9}, '.{3}') and districtcode !=concat(#{thisVillage0to9}, '000')and epidemic = 1
select count(*) from managers where county=#{districtName}
select neckletid from sheepdogs where districtcode=#{hamletCode}
select count(*) from exhibitrealtime where districtcode=#{hamletCode}
select count(*) from appexhibitrealtime where districtcode=#{hamletCode}
